Name: Rhythm Race
About the game: A brief note from the developers: The game will still undergo many changes in mechanics and visuals, we count on your feedback to make the game more and more profitable. Rhythm Race is a rhythm game with different songs in a setting mixed with futurism, neon and synth wave. In it, you will compete against legends of the futuristic race and do your best to win. 20 songs in quick play mode with 3 difficulty levels. Playable tutorial mode to learn how to play quickly. Options menu to remap the keyboard keys To play you use the Q W E R T Y keys to change the selected color. Circular dots require you to use the action button (Space Bar) In the continuous arrows you need to be in the correct color and press the action button at the beginning of the path.
